proposals.title: Predict Future Rice Exports to Bangladesh
proposals.problem_statement: Forecasting future rice exports to Bangladesh is crucial for trade planning and policy-making. Understanding export trends can help stakeholders make informed decisions.

join_plan.notes: No join required as this dataset stands alone.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using mean or median of the respective columns.

proposals.validation_plan: Use time-series cross-validation to evaluate model performance.
quality_checks: Ensure no data leakage by avoiding future data in training.
Check for consistent units and scales in the target and feature columns.

proposals.title: Analyze Trends in Rice Cultivation and Production
proposals.problem_statement: Understanding trends in rice cultivation and production can provide insights into agricultural productivity and resource allocation. This analysis can inform policy and investment decisions.

join_plan.notes: Join on Crop and Season to combine area, production, and yield data.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Handle missing values by imputing with mean or median of the respective columns.

proposals.validation_plan: Use descriptive statistics and visualizations to validate trends.
quality_checks: Ensure consistent units and scales in the feature columns.
Validate the join operation to ensure correct alignment of data.

proposals.title: Cluster Rice Varieties Based on Export Patterns
proposals.problem_statement: Clustering rice varieties based on their export patterns can help identify groups of similar varieties and inform targeted marketing strategies.

join_plan.notes: No join required as this dataset stands alone.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values using mean or median of the respective columns.

proposals.validation_plan: Evaluate cluster quality using silhouette scores and visual inspection.
quality_checks: Ensure consistent units and scales in the feature columns.
Check for outliers and handle them appropriately.
